bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Partial Discharge Measurement in Liquid- Filled Power Transformers and Shunt Reactors
IEEE Guide for Partial Discharge Measurement in Liquid- Filled Power Transformers and Shunt Reactors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The detection and measurement by the wide-band apparent charge method of partial discharges occurring in liquid-filled power transformers and shunt reactors during dielectric tests are covered. The standard covers the measuring instrument, calibrator characteristics, test circuits, calibration procedure, and partial discharge measurement during induced-voltage tests.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: ANSI/IEEE Std: Transformers and Shunt Reactors
IEEE Std C57.113-2010 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.113-1991)
